CV: Matthew A Birkinshaw
Senior Rolling Stock Engineer
London (East) E14
Email: matthewbirkinshaw@gmail.com
Tel: 07459305252
CAREER SUMMARY:
Highly motivated Senior Rolling Stock Systems, Reliability, Type Test, and TCMS (Train Control Management System) Engineer with over 30 years of experience working with numerous types and Classes of Rolling Stock, Systems, Sub-Systems in the UK and overseas.
Experiences include, Electrical design, Control Software Development (TCMS, TMS), Type Test, Static Test, Commissioning, Reliability, Performance, Technical Engineering Support, RAMS (Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, Safety) on all Rolling Stock Vehicles Systems, Sub-Systems/Control Systems  and the associated integration of new generation signalling Systems (SCADA, ETCS, ERTMS, ATP, SD CV: Matthew A Birkinshaw
Senior Rolling Stock Engineer
London (East) E14
Email: matthewbirkinshaw@gmail.com
Tel: 07459305252
CAREER SUMMARY:
Highly motivated Senior Rolling Stock Systems, Reliability, Type Test, and TCMS (Train Control Management System) Engineer with over 30 years of experience working with numerous types and Classes of Rolling Stock, Systems, Sub-Systems in the UK and overseas.
Experiences include, Electrical design, Control Software Development (TCMS, TMS), Type Test, Static Test, Commissioning, Reliability, Performance, Technical Engineering Support, RAMS (Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, Safety) on all Rolling Stock Vehicles Systems, Sub-Systems/Control Systems  and the associated integration of new generation signalling Systems (SCADA, ETCS, ERTMS, ATP, SDO, DOO, TBTC, ATC, ATO) driverless, wayside Controls.
Other experience includes, Acceptance and Conformance/Compliance Engineering activities in relation to the Certification of new and refurbished Rolling Stock Vehicles for various Projects to relevant Railway Group Standards, BSI, GM/RT, EN, ISO, and BS EN for new and upgraded Rolling Stock Fleets in order to achieve current Railway Industry Compliance.
Current continuous studies
Studying towards a Masters, MSc degree in Engineering part time through correspondence. Studying various Engineering modules/credits incorporating (STEM), Science, Technology, Engineering, Maths, specialising in Systems Engineering.
DETAILED EMPLOYMENT HISTORY:
March 2019 – January 2020	Gemini Rail Tech (GRT), Birmingham, Aston University Science Park.
Senior Engineer (Electrical, Rolling Stock) & Project Lead Engineer
Lead Engineer, leading an Engineering team on the design installation of the new Greater Anglia, Stadler Class 755/3 TAWS (Train Approach Warning System).
Class 442 Re-traction Project Senior Electrical Engineer and support with Mechanical and Control Systems Engineering upgrades.
Electrical integration design of existing traction equipment and innovative power solutions, Lithium Titanite batteries, Hydrogen fuel cell technology with the GRT innovations team.
Type Test Engineer of the Re-tractioned Class 442 Fleet supporting the KED (Kiepe Electric Dusseldorf) engineering team.
Class 442 Acceptance, Compliance and Conformance Engineering in relation to the Certification of the Re-tractioned Fleet.
Jul 2017 – Feb 2019		18 Month career break, studying towards MSc degree in Systems 					Engineering, Systems thinking in Practice through the Open University.
Jul 2016 – Jun 2017		Alstom Transportation, Projects Systems Engineer, Golders Green Depot
Project Systems Engineer
Working for the New Projects team on the Northern Line (LUL) at Golders Green Depot as Projects Systems Engineer. Roles included liaising with the depot Engineering and suppliers of modified or improved Engineering components regarding the following New Projects.
All new major overhaul programs/projects.
Future proofing the depot's Engineering facilities in order to enhance greater availability of the Fleet.
Working alongside the Engineering team regarding NTFL (New Trains for London) including the Battersea extension for Reliability, Availability, Maintainability and Safety (RAMS) Engineering
Technical document author of various System/Sub-Systems regarding modifications, component supply, Standard Operations.
Liaising with suppliers both in the UK and overseas regarding technical requirements of New Project's regarding reliability and standards, both LU (London Underground), BS EN, BSI and UK GMRT's.
Jan 2016 – May 2016		Wabtec, Virgin East-Coast Mainline, Bounds Green Maintenance Depot
Rolling Stock Engineer, Remote Condition Monitoring/Reliability
Data analysis of remotely downloaded vehicle events for defect control and reliability enhancement.
Creating algorithms and rules engines for HVAC system data (TCMS) to enhance system reliability, defect control and rectification.
Critical analysis of reliability modifications and reporting to design Engineers.
Assisting technicians with complex defects in an Engineering capacity.
Mar 2014 – Jun 2015		Transport for London, Chief Operating Office, Canary Wharf
Rolling Stock Engineer
Eng

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
